scripts.pub: git commit -am 'pre-publish' --allow-empty && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.pubn: r=1; while [ $r -eq 1 ]; do npm run pub; r=$?; sleep 15; done
scripts.local:deploy: npm run build && npm run local:deploy-grammar-editor && npm run local:deploy-lezer-grammar
scripts.local:deploy-lezer-grammar: P="../lezer-grammar/node_modules/${npm_package_name}" && mkdir -p $P && rsync -arvhP --filter '+ package.json' --filter '+ dist/' --filter '+ dist/**' --filter '- **'  ./ $P && npm run local:deploy-lezer-grammar-endpoint
scripts.local:deploy-lezer-grammar-endpoint: P="../lezer-grammar/endpoint/node_modules/${npm_package_name}"; echo $P; mkdir -p $P; rsync -arvhP --filter '+ package.json' --filter '+ dist/' --filter '+ dist/**' --filter '- **'  ./ $P
